solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public String licenseKeyFormatting(String s, int k) {--newline--            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();--newline--            for (int i = s.length() - 1; i >= 0; i--)--newline--                if (s.charAt(i) != '-')--newline--                    sb.append(sb.length() % (k + 1) == k ? '-' : "").append(s.charAt(i));--newline--            return sb.reverse().toString().toUpperCase();--newline--        } --newline--    --newline--}
